data.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
data.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.

relatedRecords.name: TechBash 2020
relatedRecords.description: At TechBash, attendees will take their skills to the next level, learning from experts who share their knowledge in a fun, collaborative, and inclusive environment. TechBash is focused on Web, Cloud, DevOps, Architecture, Best Practices, Soft Skills, and much more. We provide 3 full days of keynotes…

relatedRecords.name: DevOne Detroit 2020
relatedRecords.description: In the world of technology, the only constant is change. Our mission at DevOne is to embrace that change, and to allow it to take us places we had not previously imagined possible.
